adala palana mila ullanghanaya karana parshawa walata erehiwa thadin nithiya kriyathmaka karana bawath mahajanathawata rajaya labadena sahanaya ee lesinma labennata salassawima mema watalim sidukirime apekshawa bawath ema niwedanaye wadiduratath sandahanwa atha. 2017 desambar 06 wanada paribhogika katayuthu pilibanda adhikariya wisin nikuth kala athi wishesha gasat niwedanayata anuwa ek pol gediyak sandaha rupiyal 75.00 ka uparima sillara milak niyama kara athi athara thawath aahara bhanda 3k sandaha da uparima sillara milak niyama kara atha. 2017 desambar 06 wanada paribhogika katayuthu pilibanda adhikariya wisin nikuth kala athi wishesha gasat niwedanaya pahatha dakwe.
